abstract: Back in mid-June — which somehow seems a long, long time ago — Steven Rattner, the co-founder of investment firm Quadrangle Group, offered a warning. In a commentary in The Wall Street Journal, he said that the market for high-yield corporate debt, the lifeblood of the leveraged buyout industry, was headed for trouble.
lead_paragraph: Back in mid-June — which somehow seems a long, long time ago — Steven Rattner, the co-founder of investment firm Quadrangle Group, offered a warning. In a commentary in The Wall Street Journal, he said that the market for high-yield corporate debt, the lifeblood of the leveraged buyout industry, was headed for trouble.

headline.main: Rattner and S&P See Big Debt Trouble Ahead
